mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( login_id, password, name, nickname, address, age, tel, gender ) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{age}, #{tel}, #{gender} )

select login_id , password , id from ( select login_id , password , id from user union all select admin_login_id , admin_password , id from admin ) as combined_data where login_id = #{loginId} and password = #{password};
SELECT ifnull(count(login_id) , 0) login_id FROM user WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
SELECT ifnull(count(nickname) , 0) nickname FROM user WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
